13.title: Inflation

132.content:
"I have gathered you all here today," Tails said when he got everyone's attention, "to witness a new breakthrough in science. With my latest invention, the Radioactive Manipulator, anyone that steps inside will get a random superpower." Al least 75% of them had no idea what he was talking about."Here," Tails said, "Let me demonstrate." He goes over to the control panels and types in random keys. But while he was typing, he made one tiny error, and the machine started to malfunction. It started to glow green, then seemed to expand, and then explode. All of them were blown back by the explosion. "Whew!" Tails said from the adrenaline of the explosion, "Is everyone all right?" They all gave him a thumbs up.


A Surprise: YOU can choose who you want to be this story.

Will it be Sonic, who now has lost his incredible speed to weight gain by collecting rings, or Shadow, who has lost his chaos powers and speed to hot air whenever he gets angry (Body)?
132.title: The Beginning of The Super Animals

1321.content: As Sonic got himself up, he said, "Tails, for the first time, I have to ask what the hell did you do to us?!" "I'm not sure Sonic," Tails said. "Well whatever it was," Sonic said, "It made me hungry for rings." Sonic took out a golden ring and absorbed it like he did in his first life. Only this time, he wanted another. He grabbed five more rings and absorbed them as well. "That's better," Sonic said, "Kinda." He looked back at Tails and saw that he had a ghastly face aimed at Sonic. "What?" Sonic said. Tails kept looking at him horrificly.
1321.title: And it begins......

choices: Ignore Tails and threaten him further
Glance for a second and continue threatening
1322.content: As Shadow started to recover himself, a flame inside him lit and turned to Tails. When he recovered himself enough to speak, he yelled, "You little bitch! What the hell did you do to me!?" "I don't know!" Tails said. He was then lifted up by Shadow's right hand into the air. "If you don't tell me what the fuck you did to me, I will rip out your heart, eat it, and make you into a lifeless piece of shit!" As Tails was near ultimate nightmare come true face, he glanced down, then looked down. "Um," Tails said shaking, "Shadow?"
1322.title: And so it begins.......

13231.content: As Blaze recovered herself, she started to feel a slight chill running through her body instead of the usual heat she felt. "Who turned the thermostat on?" she said. "No one did," Tails said. "Then why do I feel cold?" Blaze asked, "And I usually feel warm." "Hmm," Tails said, then looked at Blaze's chest as she thrust forward. "Uh," Tails said, "Blaze?" "Yes?" she said.
13231.title: And yet it begins......

13232.content: As Silver recovered himself, he started to look at Blaze and get that feeling of naiveness again. "Will you stop becoming naive every time you look at me?" Blaze said. "Well I can't help it," Silver said, not noticing his skin was changing, "I guess it's just a phase that I'm going through. What with all the things that-" As he kept rambling, his skin turned completely blue. "-and furthermore," he said, but then stopped at the sight of Blaze being scared. "Is something wrong Blaze?" Silver asked. Blaze made no sound nor movement.

Tails rised himself up slowly and said, "Yep." "What the hell did you do to me?" Bolt asked. "I'm not sure," Tails said, "Try doing something." Bolt got up and walked around. "No," Tails said, "That doesn't set it off." Bolt walked in circles. "No." Bolt walked in a figure-8. "This is going to take a while," Tails said.


12 hours later........
They were both now in the F of things in everyday life. Everyone else went home, trying to figure out theirs. "Ok," Tails said, "Let's try this fire hydrant that is hooked up to the water mainframe." Bolt touched it and........

134.content: Was he going for a swim (will be in a speedo), just walking by (will be in his clothes), or will he be lost and thirsty (will be naked)?
134.title: The What To Determine It

135.content:
Alright then, have a go at these two.


A New Speedo (Groin Inflation Gas)
After his old one gets cut in half in a battle with Metal Sonic, the Commander goes out and buys another one. But this one's got a secret.

The New Formula (Groin Inflation Liquid)
While on the Space Colony ARK, the Commander devises a new male enhancement formula. But this is no ordinary one.

Even More Stories!
135.title: More Stories!

1351.content:
As Bolt stood, clothing almost destroyed, staring at a now beaten up but not dead Metal Sonic, he licked his own blood off his arm and laid it next to his revolver. He breathed heavily multiple times from the exhaustion of the battle. But he knew it was almost over. As he grabbed the revolver, Metal Sonic pulled out another spinning saw and tossed it across my left hand, slicing it off completely. He then went to grab it with his right hand, but the saw came back and sliced it clean off. The saw then stopped in mid air and sliced off the last part of his clothing, leaving him blood-tattered and handless....in a Speedo. The saw then went back to Metal Sonic and he put it away. "Sentence Input:" he said in his robotic voice, "Now it is futile for you to defeat me. You will possibly die in 5 seconds." 5 seconds go by. Bolt is still on his knees not dead. "Ok," Metal Sonic said, "Um, 10 seconds." This time, he was right. At the 7 second mark, Bolt started to lose consciousness and life. At 10 seconds, he fell to the floor, now only seeing black.


"How is that possible with him losing so much blood?" a voice said. "It's possible," another voice said, "He is a god. Too bad his clothes weren't." As Bolt barely opened his eyes, he saw a bright white light that just stood there. "Is this heaven?" he said. "No," the 1st voice said, "But some people think it is when they die and come back to life." Bolt turns to the voice and sees a orange cat in a white coat, and next to him Blaze. "Thank god you're alive!" Blaze said while hugging Bolt, "I thought you were actually dead." "Well," Bolt said, "How come I'm not dead?" "Well," the orange cat said, "Your friend Sonic was nearby so he saved you. He got your hands as well." "Good," Bolt said, "Now how long am I going to be here?" "About 2 months," the orange cat said. Bolt groaned at the length of time he said.


2 months later...
Bolt was walking down the street, wearing his G.U.N Commander's Outfit, the only thing he had to wear. It felt uncomfortable without his red Speedo to keep his fur off the silk lining of his pants. So today, he was going to buy another Speedo. He was heading to the shopping mall where they have a section for swimwear/underwear. When he arrived at that section of the mall, he saw multiple stores. But he doesn't know which one to go to. And he was think about something other than a Speedo, but only partially. So, where does he go?
1351.title: Time to get a new Speedo

13511.content: Bolt walked to the store that was named Vick's Secret. "Hmm," he said, "Interesting." He walked through the door and saw nothing but underwear. He thought this would be a normal transaction until........"Ah!" a voice said, "The famed Commander, in my store!" Bolt turns towards the checkout area and sees a orange hawk with an Italian mustache. "So," the orange hawk said, "What type of underwear do you want?" "Briefs," Bolt said. "Red or white?" the orange hawk asks.
13511.title: Vick's Secret (Briefs)

13512.content: Bolt walked to the store that was named Swimwear Warehouse. "Hmm," he said, "Interesting." He walked through the door and saw nothing but swimwear. He thought this would be a normal transaction until........."Ah!" a voice said, "The Commander in my radical store! Sweet!" Bolt turns to the checkout area and sees a brown cat wearing red swim trunks. "So," the cat asks, "What swimwear do you want bro? Surfer? Trunks? Lifeguard?" "Speedo," Bolt said. "Lifeguard! Alright!" the brown cat said, "What type of lifeguard are you? Are you a lifeguard that's just a lifeguard [Red and White] or are you an epic lifeguard [Black and Red]?"
13512.title: Swimwear Warehouse (Speedo)

choices: Go Home and test his Speedo out in the pool
135121.content:
"Look," Bolt said, "I just want a Speedo." "Ok," the brown cat said, "Red and White then. The dressing room is over there." Bolt walks to the dressing room and shuts the door behind him.


30 minutes later.......
Bolt is walking down the street again, this time without the pain in his groin. As he walks by a pole, he notices a flyer saying, "Wanted: New Lifeguard. Must save people drowning." Bolt pondered the flyer for a while.
135121.title: Red and White

"Alright," the brown cat said, "We're going epic. The dressing room is over there." Bolt walked to the dressing room and closed the door behind him.


30 minutes later........
Bolt was walking down the street, this time feeling epic from his epic Speedo. As he walked by a pole, he noticed a flyer on it saying, "Wanted: Epic Lifeguard needed. Must be able to save people." Bolt pondered on this job for a while.
135122.title: Black and Red

1351321.content: Bolt walked to the store that was named Surface Swimwear. "Hmm," he said, "Interesting." He walked through the door and saw nothing but swimwear. He started to think that it was another swimsuit store. Until.........."Oh!" someone said, "Commander!" Bolt turned to the cashier area and saw a green echidna with hair like Russell Brand. "You're not going to shut me down are you?" the echidna said. "No," Bolt said, "Why would I do that?" The echidna recovered himself and said, "Because my swimwear isn't designed for water. It's designed as underwear." "Oh," Bolt said, "Well maybe I could purchase something from you." "Purchase from me?" the echidna said, "Oh what joy is coming over me!" The echidna ran over to the men's side and asked, "Do you wear boxers?" "No," Bolt said, "Well, used to, but now that I have women-" "I get you now," the echidna said. He then grabbed two Speedos and ran back to the register. "I have two options for you. A red Speedo, and a white Speedo. Which do you want?"

He thought he could get everything individual here until......."Ah!" a voice said, "The Commander! Please don't shut me down!" Bolt turns to the checkout area and sees a blue and yellow hedgehog. "Why would I do that?" Bolt asked. "Never mind," the hedgehog said, "Now what combo number do you want?" "Uh, combo number?" Bolt said. "Yes," the hedgehog said, "How many different groin coverers do you want on at once?"

135331.content: As Bolt walked up to the front door of Swipe's General Store, notebook and pencil in hand, he started to get a suspicious feeling of uncertainy that this store had a secret inside it. Nonetheless, he went inside. As soon as the door shut behind him, he heard someone say, "A Reporter! Thank goodness!" Out from the counter came a red fox with a star hanging out a rod that was stuck in her head. "You sure you're going to get publicity for me?" Swipe asked. "Yes madam," Bolt said, "But I would like for you to ask some questions." "Ask away," Swipe said. "What exactly do you sell here?" "Well, mainly basics foods, but the main thing we sell is gum." "What kind of gum exactly?" "Wonka's three-course gum." "How many flavors of it are there?" "15. Our most popular is Blueberry Pie. Here. Try it." In her right hand is a blue stick of gum. Bolt started to get suspicious.
